sentences.english: I killed someone, so I had to go. Otherwise I would be captured and sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 杀了人，我害怕被警察抓住判刑枪毙。

sentences.english: What sentence will they be given?
sentences.chinese: 对这些人将会怎样判刑？

sentences.english: The hijacker was sentenced to 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这名劫匪被判刑3年。

sentences.english: The Nazi war criminals were condemned for crimes against humanity.
sentences.chinese: 纳粹战犯因其灭绝人性的罪行而被判刑。

sentences.english: It could also be used as evidence to substantiate prison sentences.
sentences.chinese: 它亦可以被用来作为判刑的依据。

sentences.english: He has been taking drug after he spent some time in prison when he was 17.
sentences.chinese: 萨夏17岁被判刑后，在监狱待了很长一段时间。

sentences.english: But after the father embezzles sentences, I arrogant collapse completely.
sentences.chinese: 可是父亲贪污被判刑后，我的骄傲就一败涂地。

sentences.english: He was convicted and fled the US before he was sentenced.
sentences.chinese: 波兰斯基被判有罪，并于判刑前逃离美国。

sentences.english: He served three years of his four-year sentence and then was released for good behavior .
sentences.chinese: 他判刑四年，服满三年后，因表现良好而提前获释。

sentences.english: He received an 18-month sentence for burglary.
sentences.chinese: 他因入室抢劫被判刑18个月。

sentences.english: Convicted criminals are debarred from voting in elections.
sentences.chinese: 已判刑罪犯均被褫选举投票。

sentences.english: Because join underworld gang, kelina is thrown into jail to be sentenced 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 因为加入帮会，柯里南身陷囹圄被判刑20年。

sentences.english: Hillary and I were in court with Mother when he was sentenced.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰被判刑的时候，我和希拉里陪着母亲出庭旁听。

sentences.english: One of those sentenced to death was said to be a member of a pro-monarchist group.
sentences.chinese: 据称，其中一名被判刑者是反君主主义组织的成员。

sentences.english: It was not until 2002 that several men were convicted.
sentences.chinese: 直到2002年，几名男子才被判刑。

sentences.english: The accused was convicted of murder and will be sentenced next week.
sentences.chinese: 被告已被定谋划杀罪并于下周判刑。

definition: deferred death sentence/commuted death sentence with forced labor and judicial review after two years (PRC) (legal)
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
